name: Dungeon of Elements for PC, Mac, Linux
blurb: Dungeon of Elements is an RPG with combat inspired by Dr. Mario & Tetris. Crafting, gear, pets, a branching story, and more.

rewards.reward: TADPOLE\r\n==============================\r\nYour support for Dungeon of Elements is greatly appreciated. We will post your name with a message of thanks on our Facebook page. The positive karma this will bring you is incalculable.

RIBBIT
==============================
* 1 digital copy of Dungeon of Elements for PC. No DRM! ($5 less than the retail price of $20)

*  Thank you from the team of Dungeon of Elements.

* Access to a private forum for DoE development and discussion.

KROQUE
==============================
* Everything from previous tier.
* Your name on the DoE website THANK YOU! page.
* Dungeon of Elements wallpaper pack. Gorgeous full color artwork.

HARLEQUIN FROG
==============================
* Everything from previous tier.
* From this tier forward, you also get ANOTHER GAME! =>
* 1 digital copy of Tower of Elements for PC or Mac (match 3, tower defense game). No DRM! (Retail: $10)
* Dungeon of Elements digital art book. 20+ pages. Concept art. Design sketches. Full color high resolution portraits.

GLASS FROG
==============================
* Everything from previous tier.     
* Dungeon of Elements digital poster.
* $15 worth of Medallions (virtual currency used in our F2P online games, Threshold RPG, Coin ‘n Carry, and all future online games).

TOMATO FROG
==============================
* Everything from previous tier.
* Additional copy of Dungeon of Elements. (Total: 2)

HORNED FROG
==============================
* Everything from previous tier.
* Additional $35 worth of Medallions (Total: $50)
* Your name included in the credits of the game.
* Hunter’s Bow weapon. This is the only bow in Dungeon of Elements. Added to all copies of DoE you receive as a backer reward. Exclusive to this tier and above.

LEAP FROG
==============================
* Everything from previous tier.
* 2nd copy of Tower of Elements. 
* Frogdice Fans Mailing List: Special mailing list where we share announcements with fans before we release the information to the public. Upcoming games. Content updates to existing games. Surveys or polls on game development. Etc. (Average of 1 mail per month, and usually less. This isn’t a mailing list for spam or self-promotion.)

GOLIATH FROG
==============================
* Everything from previous tier. 
* Additional $100 worth of Medallions (Total: $150)
* Personalized letter signed by the entire team personally thanking you for your support.
* Special "Froggie" pet for all copies of DoE you receive as a reward. All characters begin the game with this pet. Exclusive to this tier and above.

PEACOCK FROG
==============================
* Everything from previous tier. 
* Additional copy of Dungeon of Elements. (Total: 3)
* Additional $100 worth of Medallions (Total: $250)

POISON DART FROG
==============================
* Everything from previous tier.
* Additional $100 worth of Medallions (Total: $350)
* Name your own in-game Achievement. (Subject to approval.)
* Charybdis, Battleaxe of Fury weapon. Added to all copies of DoE you receive as a backer reward. Exclusive to this tier and above.

TREE FROG
==============================
* Everything from previous tier.
* Additional copy of Dungeon of Elements. (Total: 4)
* Additional $250 worth of Medallions (Total: $600)
* Special "Sparkie Doll" blue dragon, in-game, plushie-like pet for all copies of DoE you receive as a reward. All characters begin the game with this pet. Exclusive to this tier and above.
* Invitation to the Dungeon of Elements launch party in Lexington, KY. Launch party will be part of FroggaCon, the annual fan convention for players of Frogdice games.

BULLFROG (limit 10)
==============================
* Everything from previous tier.
* Additional copy of Dungeon of Elements. (Total: 5)
* Additional $250 worth of Medallions (Total: $850)
* Guardian Shield offhand item. Added to all copies of DoE you receive as a backer reward. This is an artifact shield originally from Threshold RPG. Exclusive to this tier and above.

PACMAN FROG
==============================
* Everything from previous tier.
* Additional copy of Dungeon of Elements. (Total: 6)
* Additional $500 worth of Medallions (Total: $1,350)
* Work with our designers and artists to design your own weapon or offhand item in Dungeon of Elements. All Pacman/Frog In Residence copies of DoE will include ALL custom weapons designed as part of this reward. As more people back this tier and above, everyone gets more fancy gear!

FROG IN RESIDENCE
==============================
* Everything from previous tier.
* Additional $2,500 worth of Medallions (Total: $3,850)
* Additional copy of Dungeon of Elements. (Total: 7)
* Guest of Honor for Dungeon of Elements launch party/FroggaCon in Lexington, KY. You will be celebrated and held in high esteem throughout the event.
* Your character (or one of your design) will be created and featured prominently in our next game. (Charcter design must be suitable for the game theme and subject to approval by the design team of that game). We have not announced that game, but it is tentatively scheduled for release in October 2013. This also means you learn about the game long before anyone else!
